mapper.insert: insert into board (no, id, title, contents, regdate) values (#{no:INTEGER}, #{id:VARCHAR}, #{title:VARCHAR}, #{contents:VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title:VARCHAR}, contents = #{contents:VARCHAR}, regdate = sysdate where no = #{no:INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from board
title like '%'||#{word}||'%'
id = #{word}
contents like '%'||#{word}||'%'

select no, id, title, contents, to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regdate from board
title like '%'||#{word}||'%'
id = #{word}
contents like '%'||#{word}||'%'
order by no desc
